summary.description:
an integrated phylogenetic tool, from sequences to reconciliations.

Treerecs is an open-source (species- and gene-) tree reconciliation software distributed under the GNU AGPL licence.

||| COMMON LINK WITH (PUB. & NAME DIFFERENT) bio.tools/leon (INRIA.FR), bio.tools/colib_read (INRIA.FR), bio.tools/gatb (INRIA.FR), bio.tools/plast (INRIA.FR)
summary.name: Treerecs
